comments: Allen's (CLE) arms collapse as he absorbs the oncoming marginal contact during the pick against Butler (MIA).
Jaquez Jr. (MIA) is in the paint for less than three seconds when he is imminently exiting.
Okoro (CLE) slightly extends his arm into Rozier's (MIA) body, and marginal contact occurs during the rebound.
Jovic (MIA) briefly grasps Allen's (CLE) arm and then releases it as marginal contact occurs when Allen moves to establish screening position.
Jaquez Jr. (MIA) makes marginal contact to Niang's (CLE) arm at the start of the drive, which he is able to move through.
Jaquez Jr. (MIA) initiates contact with Niang's (CLE) arm that affects his driving shot attempt.
Martin (MIA) gives a step of distance when establishing himself in Allen's (CLE) path and the contact that occurs during the screen is marginal.

Replay review of the foul called on Okoro (CLE) pursuant to a coach's challenge was deemed unsuccessful. Okoro contests the shot and initiates contact with Rozier's (MIA) lower body that affects his ability to land after the release of the jump shot attempt.

Okoro (CLE) goes to, not through, Rozier's (MIA) space and marginal contact occurs as the two come together off-ball. Okoro's arm slightly extends as a result of the two players releasing from the contact.
Allen (CLE) is imminently exiting the lane within three seconds.
Jovic (MIA) briefly grasps Allen's (CLE) arm and marginal contact occurs prior to releasing it, as Allen moves to establish a screening position in Rozier's (MIA) path.
LeVert (CLE) gathers the ball with his left foot and then comes to a jump stop prior to releasing the ball.
The shot clock expires and a 24 second violation is correctly assessed.
LeVert (CLE) cleanly dislodges the ball away from Butler (MIA).
LeVert (CLE) contests Butler's (MIA) jump shot and the contact after the release, and follow-through, is marginal.
Allen (CLE) brings his hands toward Martin (MIA) and the contact that occurs as Allen releases away to roll is marginal.
Rozier (MIA) gathers the ball on his left foot and takes two steps before the shot attempt.
Okoro (CLE) legally contests Rozier's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Butler (MIA) briefly places his hand to LeVert's (CLE) body during the drive, which he is able to move through.
Okoro (CLE) commits a take foul on Rozier (MIA).
Martin (MIA) legally contests the jump shot attempt and the lower body contact, which is initiated by Garland (CLE), is marginal.
